analysis.description:
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xce0cd513a069e8ec9cb625fcdf6d5f29aa912dbc.sol#5-6)
Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xce0cd513a069e8ec9cb625fcdf6d5f29aa912dbc.sol#36)
